A

AddAttribute(String) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Initializes the attribute vector if necessary and adds a numeric attribute
AddAttribute(String, Object[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Adds a nominal attribute to the attributes set, nominal attributes are ones with defined set of countable values
AddClustersAsClass(int[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
A function that takes an int array of cluster indices and adds them as an attribute, RemoveClustersFromData() should be called after handling this method
AddStringAttribute(String) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Initalizes the attribute vector if necessary and adds a string attribute
addWordOccurence(String) - Method in class textlib.TfIdf
Increments the occurence count of a word by 1

BLUE - Static variable in class imagelib.ImageParsing
 
Build(WekaData) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Trains the classifier on the given data, this is the heart function of every classifier, and should be called after data is input, or new data is in
buildAllDocuments() - Method in class textlib.TfIdf
Calculates tf-idf of all documents in the library
buildDocument(String) - Method in class textlib.TfIdf
Calculates the Tf-Idf of the given document

C

calculateSimilarity(double[], double[], int) - Static method in class similarity.Similarity
Calculates similarity of type given between two vectors
COSINE similarity - normalized dot product L2 metric - root of sum of squares of differences L1 metric - sum of differences
calculateSimilarity(double[], double[]) - Static method in class similarity.Similarity
Override for calculateSimilarity using L2 metric as default metric
calculateTfIdf(TfIdf) - Method in class textlib.Document
Calculates the tfidf of the words after called by the parent TfIdf class
Classify(WekaData) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Given the test data, runs the trained classifier on it, assigns the result of classification to an integer array and returns it
Classify(Object[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Takes the given object array of an instance and classifies it, this function should be used for classifiers that return class number

If the function is used on a multi class classifier that implements distributionForInstance method instead of classifyInstance, it will be invalid.
Classify(int[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Override for Classify using integer data
Classify(double[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Override of classify using double data
Classify(float[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Override of classify using float data
ClassifyProbs(Object[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Given the object array of an instance values, will return the probability of every class.
ClassifyProbs(int[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Override of ClassifyProbs using integer data
ClassifyProbs(double[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Override of ClassifyProbs using double data
ClassifyProbs(float[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Override of ClassifyProbs using float data
clusterData(WekaData) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClusterer
Given a set of data, clusters them all and returns the cluster number they belong to
clusterData(WekaData, int) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClusterer
Given a set of data, clusters them all and returns the cluster number they belong to

cosSimilarity(Document, Document) - Method in class textlib.TfIdf

D

docSize - Variable in class textlib.TfIdf
 
Document - Class in textlib
Class that represents a text document Keeps track of the number of times a word appears in the document, it's term frequency, and eventually, its inverse document frequency (if used with TfIdf) for finding important keywords in the document
Document(BufferedReader, TfIdf) - Constructor for class textlib.Document
Constructor for document class that is used by the parent TfIdf class
documentNames() - Method in class textlib.TfIdf
Returns the String array of all document names
documents - Variable in class textlib.TfIdf

Returns the value histogram of a PImage as a double array
hist(PApplet, int[]) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing

histBW(PApplet, PImage, int) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Returns the histogram of the image after converting it to black and white with the specified number of bins
histBW(PApplet, int[], int) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override for histBW function that uses the pixel array instead of PImage
histColor(PApplet, PImage, int, int) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Returns the color histogram of the image as a single array of doubles where it is bins * 3 length, if COLOR is specified to be anything, than it is only bins length for that color value
histColor(PApplet, int[], int, int) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override for histColor function using the pixel array of the image
histColor(PApplet, PImage) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override of histColor for default selection of 256 bins and all colors
histColor(PApplet, int[]) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override of histColor for default selection of 256 bins and all colors
histColor(PApplet, PImage, int) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override of histColor for default selection of all colors with specified number of bins
histColor(PApplet, int[], int) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override of histColor for default selection of and all colors with specified number of bins
histColor(PApplet, PImage, char) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override of histColor for default selection of 256 bins with specified color selection
histHue(PApplet, PImage, int, boolean) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Creates the hue histogram of the image with given number of bins and whether to include dark pixels or not
histHue(PApplet, int[], int, boolean) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Creates the hue histogram of the image with given number of bins and whether to include dark pixels or not
histHue(PApplet, PImage) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override for hue histogram function using default values of 360 bins and show black

Override for hue histogram function using default values of 360 bins and show black

histHue(PApplet, PImage, boolean) - Static method in class imagelib.ImageParsing
Override for hue histogram function using default value of 360 bins with specified setting of showing black

I

imagelib - package imagelib
 
ImageParsing - Class in imagelib
Class that contains image to data parsing functions such as hue histogram, value histogram
They are all static functions, therefore are passed in the Processing Applet, the image and required variables and return the result directly
ImageParsing() - Constructor for class imagelib.ImageParsing
 
InsertData(Object[][]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Use this function to enter big amount of data, takes in a 2D array of objects where each row is a single instance and parses the values to their classes.
InsertData(Object[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Use this function to enter a single data, takes in an array of objects and parses the values to their classes.
InsertData(int[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Data insertion for integer arrays
InsertData(float[]) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Data insertion for float arrays
insertDocument(String) - Method in class textlib.TfIdf
Inserts new documents into corpus

P

printData() - Method in class textlib.Document
Prints every word in the document with their information: number of times word appears Word's term frequency (number of times it appears / total word count) Word's inverse document frequency (specifically how important it is in this document)
PrintData(String) - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
Prints the dataset into an arff file

RemoveClustersFromData() - Method in class wekaizing.WekaData
A helper function that removes the last attribute, so make sure it is called after AddClustersAsClass(int[] clusters)

similarDocuments(String) - Method in class textlib.TfIdf
Returns a sorted instance of documents where first one is the closest to given document name
similarity - package similarity
 
Similarity - Class in similarity
This class is used for calculating similarity between two vectors, finding the closest vector within a library of vectors and such, it can be used for any distance metric calculations
Similarity() - Constructor for class similarity.Similarity
 
similarVectors(double[][], int, int) - Static method in class similarity.Similarity
Finds the most similar vector to the given index vector in the vectors using the given distance metric, returns the indexes of vectors in descending order, closest first
similarVectors(double[][], int) - Static method in class similarity.Similarity
Override for similarVectors using COSINE similarity as default metric
similarVectors(ArrayList<double[]>, int, int) - Static method in class similarity.Similarity
Override for similarVectors using an ArrayList of vectors instead of 2-D array
similarVectors(ArrayList<double[]>, int) - Static method in class similarity.Similarity
Override for similarVectors using the COSINE metric as default for ArrayList

T

textlib - package textlib
 
TfIdf - Class in textlib
An instance of TfIdf contains TreeMaps for documents and corpus Documents dictionary uses file names as keys, and the document class as values Corpus dictionary uses words as keys and [#articles they appear in, idf] as values To use TfIdf algorithm, user needs to create an instance of it by giving it a folder address.
TfIdf(String) - Constructor for class textlib.TfIdf
Loads all files in the folder name into the corpus, and updates if necessary
toString() - Method in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Calls the toString function of the classifier, returning an explanation

U

updateCorpus() - Method in class textlib.TfIdf
Updates the corpus, going through every word and changing their frequency

V

VOTEDPERCEPTRON - Static variable in class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
 

W

WekaClassifier - Class in wekaizing
Class that handles the Weka classifier calls
WekaClassifier() - Constructor for class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Constructor for an empty classifier, classifier is not built right away since WekaData needs to be prepared and this way seems more suitable for a better organized code
WekaClassifier(int) - Constructor for class wekaizing.WekaClassifier
Constructor for an empty classifier with the specific type
WekaClusterer - Class in wekaizing
Class that handles the Weka clusterer calls For now, the clusterer type is chosen using a String, name of classifier.
WekaClusterer() - Constructor for class wekaizing.WekaClusterer
The constructor needed for initialization
WekaClusterer(int) - Constructor for class wekaizing.WekaClusterer
The constructor with a specific type
WekaData - Class in wekaizing
Class that handles datasets, created to make it as easy as possible to create own data from scratch.
WekaData() - Constructor for class wekaizing.WekaData
Ctor with nothing
WekaData(int, int) - Constructor for class wekaizing.WekaData
Ctor to create an empty data set with given capacities, while these are not hard limits, setting them accurate will speed up things
WekaData(String) - Constructor for class wekaizing.WekaData
Ctor to read from an arff file
